close-with-changes.title: Are you sure?
close-with-changes.description: You have unsaved changes. If you close without saving, you will lose them. Are you sure you want to quit?

other-main-score-in-use.title: A general score is already defined
other-main-score-in-use.description: Would you like to make this score your general score?

delete-main-score.title: Are you sure?
delete-main-score.description: You are about to delete the general score of your simulation. Are you sure you want to continue?

beta.name: Beta
beta.caption: This content is in its experimental version.

saved-since.hour-ago: Saved an hour ago | Saved {time} hours ago
saved-since.days-ago: Saved a day ago | Saved {time} days ago

saving-changes.error: An error occurred while saving changes.

exporting-scorm.success: Your simulation has been exported to SCORM {version}!
exporting-scorm.error: An error occurred while exporting the simulation.

general.title: General information
general.description: Configure the display and gameplay options of your simulation.

no-mode-selected.title: No simulation mode selected.
no-mode-selected.description: At least one active option is required to save!

text.title: Text mode
text.description: Learners will play in an SMS-style conversation.

audio.title: Audio mode
audio.description: Learners will interact with the agent through a phone call.

video.title: Video mode
video.description: Learners will meet the agent in a video conference.

questions.label: Preparing questions
questions.description: These questions help the agent prepare for the conversation.

empty.title: No question
empty.description: You haven't added any question yet. Start by adding one.

customize.title: Experience customization
customize.description: Ask the learner questions to personalize their experience.

empty.title: No question
empty.description: You have not added any customization question yet. Start by adding one.

engine.title: Simulation engine
engine.description: Configure the scenario and enabled options for your simulation.

system-prompt.label: System instructions
system-prompt.description: Describe the content of the simulation, its scenario, and possible outcomes.

alert.title: Agent hallucination risk
alert.description: A temperature above {value} makes generation chaotic. Excessive creativity can make the simulation almost incoherent.

model.label: Generation model
model.description: Select the model that best fits your final use case.

eleven_turbo_v2_5.name: Low latency
eleven_turbo_v2_5.caption: Decent audio quality and low latency.

eleven_v3.name: Emotional
eleven_v3.caption: High audio fidelity with emotion interpretation.

no-end-mode-selected.title: No exit mode selected.
no-end-mode-selected.description: At least one active option is required to save!

by-ai.label: By the agent
by-ai.description: The AI agent may decide to exit the simulation.
by-ai.alert: Warning: If enabled, you must define exit scenarios in the system instructions, otherwise the agent cannot exit.

by-time.label: Time limit (in minutes)
by-time.description: The user will have limited time to complete the simulation.

by-user.label: By the user
by-user.description: The user can exit the simulation at any time.

evaluation.title: Evaluation
evaluation.description: Design the report generated at the end of the simulation.

empty.title: No section
empty.description: You haven't added any section yet. Start by adding one.

evaluation-method.label: Evaluation method
evaluation-method.description: Describe how the agent should evaluate the conversation.

empty.title: No axis
empty.description: You haven't added any axis yet. Start by adding one.

writing-method.label: Writing method
writing-method.description: Describe how the agent should write its feedback.
